name: Ricetta: carne stufata
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Braised Meat.

value.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
value.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

value.name: Carota
value.desc: A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.

value.name: Patata
value.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

value.name: Cipolla
value.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

value.name: Carne stufata
value.desc: A stewed dish. The meat slices were fried first, followed by the vegetable accouterments, after which they were mixed together. The soup was then added and simmered until it thickened. After this patient, slow cooking process, the meat has become soft and tender, bringing those who eat it a down-to-earth satisfaction.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained from the Event Quest "Contraption-Contrived Cooking Course Part III" (Only Available during Moonlight Merriment Event in Version 2.1)</color>
